comment: The infinite Cartesian product of a family ` B ( x ) ` with an empty member is empty. The converse of this theorem is equivalent to the Axiom of Choice, see ~ ac9 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2016.)
